code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import api from'./api';import'./OpportunitiesBoard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function OpportunitiesBoard(){const[opps,setOpps]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchOpps=async()=>{try{const res=await api.get('/opportunities/');setOpps(res.data);}catch(err){console.error('Error loading opportunities',err);}};fetchOpps();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"board-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Opportunities Board"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"opps-grid",children:opps.map((op,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"opp-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:op.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:op.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"posted-by",children:["Posted by: ",op.posted_by]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"date",children:new Date(op.date_posted).toLocaleDateString()})]},idx))})]});}export default OpportunitiesBoard;
